question_text:
Question
 31
A concrete dam holds 10 m of static water as shown in the figure (not drawn to the scale). The uplift is 
assumed to vary linearly from full hydrostatic head at the heel, to zero at the toe of dam. The coefficient 
of friction between the dam and foundation soil is 0.45. Specific weights of concrete and water are
3
24 kN/m
  and 
3
9.81 kN/m
 , respectively.
Dam
10.0 m
Soil
B
For  NO  sliding condition, the required minimum base width B (in m
, round off  to  two decimal places
) 
is__________.
